VoiceDir19.6DF9E: Hesitant to ask for help, but she really needs it.
Line19.6DF9E: Could you protect us from whatever is out there? We have nowhere else to turn.
Line7.BAE4.Dru: The evil stirring in those ruins is an affront against nature. I will make things right.
Line7.BAE4.Nec: Evil is gathering strength in those ruins. I will bring it to heel.
Line7.BAE4.Bar: No one should live in fear. I will cleanse the old ruins of evil.
Line7.BAE4.Rog: I'm going to kill whatever's in those ruins before it gets the chance to kill me.
Line7.BAE4.Sor: If there is evil lurking in those ruins, I will drag it into the light of day.
